vibesExplanation: The workout video titled '20 Minute Full Body Stretch Routine' on the Well+Good channel aligns primarily with 'The Reboot Workout' vibe, scoring 0.9, due to its focus on a relaxing, total-body stretch aimed at loosening tight muscles, ideal for starting a day or ending a workout. This classification is reinforced by comments indicating relief and well-being, fitting the deep stretch, low stress component.
